Name: Zoning, 500 Kent Avenue, Brooklyn (C 230293 ZMK)
Title: Application number C 230293 ZMK (500 Kent Avenue) submitted by 500 Kent LLC and United Jewish Organizations of Williamsburg, Inc. pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 12d, changing from an M3-1 District to an M1-5 District, property bounded by Division Avenue, Kent Avenue, the easterly prolongation of the N.Y.C. Pierhead Line, and the U.S. Pierhead and Bulkhead Line, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 2, Council District 33.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
